property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of the Arcane too often finds itself in the hands of those foolish enough to think themselves its master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although she wore Nivea's kind face, her heart held nothing but vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Whenever a Human deals damage to you, destroy it. Other non-Human creatures you control get +1/+1 and have undying. (When a creature with undying dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a servant of the light, now a slave to the dark.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {T}: Destroy target artifact if its mana value is equal to the amount of unspent mana you have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To seek the truth was her calling. To gain its power was her destiny.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, it gains haste until end of turn, and it becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference. Menace Discard a card with mana value X: Counter target spell with mana value X.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His silent stare was punctured only by his deafening roar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Huntmaster of the Fells, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Huntmaster of the Fells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever this creature transforms into Ravager of the Fells, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and 2 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ravager of the Fells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On shining argent wings she came, declaring that no harm would befall her charge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Brimaz, King of Oreskos attacks, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance that's attacking. Whenever Brimaz blocks a creature, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance that's blocking that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch, haste When Queen Marchesa enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent is the monarch, create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of artifacts your opponents control can't be activated. [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value. −2: You may reveal an artifact card you own from outside the game or choose a face-up artifact card you own in exile. Put that card into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Colorless spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. [+1]: Exile the top card of your library face down and look at it. Create a 2/2 colorless Spirit creature token. When that token leaves the battlefield, put the exiled card into your hand. −3: Destroy target permanent that's one or more colors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Gideon Blackblade is a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Gideon Blackblade during your turn. [+1]: Up to one other target creature you control gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible until end of turn. −6: Exile target nonland permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) −2: Create a 0/3 white Wall creature token with defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control. −2: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead. [+1]: Target player mills two cards. Draw a card. −8: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells your opponents cast that target a creature or planeswalker you control cost {2} more to cast. −2: Create a 2/2 blue Wizard creature token. Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn. −2: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage deals 2 damage to them. −1: Target player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card. [+1]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. −4: Each player sacrifices two creatures. −9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player. −2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more loyalty counters are removed from Chandra, Fire Artisan, she deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker. [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. −7: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may play them this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead. −2: Jaya, Venerated Firemage deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, each Dragon you control deals 1 damage to that creature. [+1]: Until end of turn, each planeswalker you control becomes a 4/4 red Dragon creature and gains flying. −3: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents can't gain life. −2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. −2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." −1: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you tap a Forest for mana, add an additional {G}. [+1]: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature land you control. Untap it. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste that's still a land. −8: You get an emblem with "Lands you control have indestructible." Search your library for any number of Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast creature spells as though they had flash. [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gains vigilance and reach. −2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. For as long as it remains exiled, you may cast it if it's a creature spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have vigilance. [+1]: You gain 3 life. −2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+0. [+1]: Add {R} or {G}. Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered. −2: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield. [+1]: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control. −3: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. −8: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. [+2]: Scry 1. −2: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink. [+2]: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. −X: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents. [+1]: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. −3: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery. [+1]: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. −3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have menace. −2: Amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.value: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. −3: You gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof. −3: Exile target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. −1: Untap target permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have first strike and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. −X: Nahiri, Storm of Stone deals X damage to target tapped creature.

property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. −2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. −1: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. −2: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card at random. −4: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player. −6: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.value: "Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows." - Hastric, Thunian scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature an opponent controls until this creature leaves the battlefield."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slivers are often seen toying with enemies they capture, not out of cruelty, but to fully learn their physical capabilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Sliver creatures have flying. All Slivers have "If this permanent would be put into a graveyard, you may put it on top of its owner's library instead."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a great bellows it hisses, and its kin, both living and dead, are lifted to safety.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Sliver creatures have flanking. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks a Sliver, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They encircled our patrol with the stealth of snakes, corralling us like livestock." - Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ward Sliver enters the battlefield, choose a color. All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first wave of slivers perished from the Riptide wizards' magic. The second wave shrugged off their spells like water.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Sliver creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.

property.value: "The hive shimmered, and its walls seemed a living mirror." - Hastric, Thunian scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of adaptation, galeriders serve multiple purposes useful to the hive. When they're not patrolling their territories, their majestic wings serve to circulate cool air through the vast hive chambers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may fateseal 1." (To fateseal 1, its controller looks at the top card of an opponent's library, then they may put that card on the bottom of that library.)

property.value: "Wait, where am I? Who am I? And what are you?" - Skyshroud secretkeeper, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Sliver creatures have "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to itself."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They evolved the ability to concentrate their neural activity into a single pulse, causing a disruptive but usually suicidal blast of psionic energy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "{T}: Target player mills a card."

property.value: "What wears down my people most, I think, is not the danger, but the endless screeching outside our camp." - Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol

property.value: Sliver creatures you control have "{2}: Untap this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A living fossil active after eons of dormancy.

property.value: All Sliver creatures have shadow. (They can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.value: These slivers, trapped between worlds since the Rathi overlay, are among the last to claim direct lineage from the lost Sliver Queen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.

property.value: "Species XR17 feeds upon the mental energies of its victims. This explains why the goblins remain unaffected." - Riptide Project researcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "{T}: Tap target permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Slivers are guided only by simple instinct. Advance the hive, and you will be welcomed. Impede the hive, and you will face unrelenting opposition." - Freyalise

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything around here has cut a deal with gravity." - Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "Sacrifice this permanent: Add {B}{B}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fascinating . . . These creatures display the paradox of tenacity and purposed self-destruction I have sought to breed into my thrulls." - Endrek Sahr, master breeder

property.value: "Seeing one slowly devour one of my party begged the question - do they know what cruelty is?" - Hastric, Thunian scout

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The question isn't whether slivers will adapt to a world's perils but whether the world's perils will adapt to slivers.

property.value: Forked tails rustled. Talons clicked. A lone sliver streaked overhead like jagged lightning, and the hive thundered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Since the last sliver arrived, even our mightiest relics splinter into shards as soon as we bring them against the hive." - Llanach, Skyshroud ranger

property.name: Flavor
